problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠C = N_0, AB = N_1, AC = N_2, AD bisects ∠BAC, DE ⊥ AB in E, if point P is the moving point on the straight line AD, then the minimum value of PE + PB is ()
raw_answer: 解:Rt△ABC中,∠C=90°,AB=5,AC=4,∴BC=3,∵∠C=90°,∴DC⊥AC,∵DE⊥AB,∴∠ACD=∠AED=90°,AC=AE=4,∠CAD=∠EAD,∴BE=1,AD垂直平分CE,即C和E关于AD对称,CD=DE,∴当P和D重合时,PE+BP的值最小,∴PE+PB的最小值=BC=3,故选:D．
